com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Prop.description: Represents the propagation mode for populating the mounted filesystem artifacts from the host to the container

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Port.description: Represents a network port mappings for ports from the container exposed on the host's network interface

properties.name: proto
properties.description: Port protocol

properties.name: hostPort
properties.description: Port of the host machine

properties.name: hostPortEnd
properties.description: Host port allocation range

properties.name: containerPort
properties.description: Port inside the container

properties.name: hostIP
properties.description: IP Address of the port to be mapped

org.eclipse.hawkbit.swupdatable:Software.description: Represents the ability of a device to install and manage a certain type of software.

statusProperties.name: softwareModuleType
statusProperties.description: The type of the software managed by this feature.

statusProperties.name: installedDependencies
statusProperties.description: List of all installed software managed by this feature. The key should be the concatenated group.name:version.

statusProperties.name: contextDependencies
statusProperties.description: Information additional dependencies relevant for software installation, e.g. hardware parts or runtimes like OSGi container or JREs.

statusProperties.name: lastFailedOperation
statusProperties.description: The last operation status indicating a finished with error.

operations.name: cancel
operations.description: Try to cancel a running installation.

operations.name: cancelRemove
operations.description: Try to cancel a remove operation.

org.eclipse.hawkbit:OperationStatus:2.0..description: Entity representing the status of an operation (install/remove) called on a device.

properties.name: correlationId
properties.description: Id used for correlating the status-update with the operation called before.

properties.name: status
properties.description: One of the predefined status, representing the failure, progress or sucess of the operation.

properties.name: softwareModule
properties.description: Required in the case of an install/download/cancel operation, absent in case of remove or cancelRemove.

properties.name: software
properties.description: Required for a remove or cancelRemove operation, absent in case of install/download/cancel.

properties.name: progress
properties.description: A progress indicator in percentage.

properties.name: message
properties.description: Message from the device to give more context to the transmitted status.

properties.name: statusCode
properties.description: Custom status code transmitted by the device.

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Conf.description: Represents a fully featured container configuration supported by the Bosch IoT Edge Agent

properties.name: domainName
properties.description: The container domain

properties.name: mountPoints
properties.description: The container's mount points

properties.name: devices
properties.description: Host devices accessible by the container

properties.name: privileged
properties.description: Indicates if the container must be run in privileged mode

properties.name: restartPolicy
properties.description: Restart policy for the container instance

properties.name: extraHosts
properties.description: Host aliases to be added to the container's networking configuration

properties.name: portMappings
properties.description: Ports exposed from the container to the host

properties.name: openStdin
properties.description: Open stdin for interactive mode

properties.name: tty
properties.description: Attach standard streams to a TTY, including stdin if it is not closed

properties.name: log
properties.description: Represents the logging configuration for the container

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Stat.description: Represents the current container's status given the container's lifecycle

org.eclipse.hawkbit:DependencyDescriptio.description: Describes a software installed on the device.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the software.

properties.name: version
properties.description: Version of the software.

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:LogM.description: Represents the log messages handling mode (buffered or direct) from the container to the log driver

literals.name: STARTED
literals.description: Confirmation that the request is received.

literals.name: DOWNLOADING_WAITING
literals.description: In the state of downloading, but waiting for another operation to complete. Ex: user confirmation.

literals.name: INSTALLING_WAITING
literals.description: In the state of installing, but waiting for another operation to complete. Ex: user confirmation, completion of another software etc.

literals.name: REMOVING
literals.description: Software is in the progress of beeing removed

literals.name: REMOVING_WAITING
literals.description: Software remove is waiting for some conditions, e.g. user-confirmation

literals.name: REMOVED
literals.description: Software part has been removed - final sucess of all removals should report FINISHED_SUCCESS

literals.name: CANCELING_WAITING
literals.description: Cancel is waiting. Ex: user confirmation.

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Cont.description: Provides lifecycle management functionalities per container and enhances container state changes traceability

statusProperties.name: imageRef
statusProperties.description: The container's image full reference in the format <host/ip[:port]>/<image-name>:<tag>

statusProperties.name: config
statusProperties.description: Provides the read-only container's configuration provided when the container was created

operations.name: stopWithOptions
operations.description: Stops the container instance applying the provided options

operations.name: remove
operations.description: Removes the container instance and feature (if the removal is successful) and forces the removal if the container is runing

org.eclipse.ditto:ConnectionStatus:1.0.0.description: Information about the status of the connectivity to a device

statusProperties.name: readySince
statusProperties.description: Timestamp when the device or the connectivity endpoint signals that the device is connected and stays connected at least for some time and is ready for receiving information

statusProperties.name: readyUntil
statusProperties.description: Timestamp until when device or the connectivity endpoint signals that it stays ready for receiving information; if it signals that it stays connected and is ready until further notice then this timestamp is symbolically set to a timestamp that is at least 1 year ahead of now

properties.name: forced
properties.description: Whether to send a SIG_KILL signal to the container's process if it does not finish within the timeout specified. The default is true

properties.name: timeout
properties.description: A timeout period in seconds in which the container must stop

properties.name: signal
properties.description: A specific signal to send to the container in order to stop it. Signals could be specified by using their names or numbers, e.g. SIGINT or 2. The default is SIGTERM

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Stat.description: Represents the current container's full state given the container's lifecycle

properties.name: status
properties.description: Represents the status of this container - Creating, Created, Running, Stopped, Paused, Exited, Dead, Unknown

properties.name: pid
properties.description: Represents the container's process's PID

properties.name: error
properties.description: Indicates whether there was a problem that has occurred while changing the state of a container

properties.name: exitCode
properties.description: Represents the last exit code of the container's internal root process

properties.name: startedAt
properties.description: A timestamp of the last successfull container's start operation

properties.name: finishedAt
properties.description: A timestamp of the last container's exit

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:LogC.description: Represents the full logging configuration for a container instance

properties.name: type
properties.description: Indicates what kind of logging will be made for this container instance. The default is JSON_FILE

properties.name: maxFiles
properties.description: The maximum number of log files permitted. If the rolled logs output creates excess files, the oldest one is removed

properties.name: maxSize
properties.description: The maximum size of the log before it is rolled. Must be in the form of an integer followed by a modifier representing the unit of measure (k, M, G or T)

properties.name: rootDir
properties.description: The root directory where to store the logs for the container under a subdirectory named by its ID

properties.name: mode
properties.description: Log messages handling mode (buffered or direct) from the container to the log driver

properties.name: maxBufferSize
properties.description: The maximum size of the log buffer it is rolled. Must be in the form of an integer followed by a modifier representing the unit of measure (k, M, G or T)

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Cont.description: A device that supports containers management via SOTA and locally

functionblocks.name: Container
functionblocks.description: Represents a single container instance and its management

functionblocks.name: ConnectionStatus
functionblocks.description: Information about the connectivity status of the device

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Rest.description: Represents the container's restart policy type - always means that each time te container exists, it will be restarted.

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:LogD.description: Represents the different supported types of logging that can be made for a container instance

org.eclipse.hawkbit:Protocol:2.0.0.description: Protocol provided for downloading an artificat

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Devi.description: Represents a serial device exposed from the host to the container mapped to a certain internal container's path

properties.name: pathOnHost
properties.description: Device path on the host machine

properties.name: pathInContainer
properties.description: Device path inside the container

properties.name: cgroupPermissions
properties.description: cgroup permissions

properties.name: filename
properties.description: Filename of the software module artifact.

properties.name: download
properties.description: Urls to download the artifact.

properties.name: checksums
properties.description: Checkum values for checksum urls.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Artifact size.

org.eclipse.hawkbit:SoftwareUpdateAction.description: Parameter used for instructing the device to install or download one or more software.

properties.name: correlationId
properties.description: An identifier used to correlate the status updates sent from the device for this action.

properties.name: softwareModules
properties.description: Software modules that needs to be processed.

properties.name: weight
properties.description: Priority in case of multiple, parallel installation instructions.

properties.name: metadata
properties.description: Any other information which should be passed to the device.

properties.name: forced
properties.description: Indicates the urgency of the update. when true, the device should install as soon as possible.

org.eclipse.hawkbit:SoftwareModuleAction.description: Parameter representing a software module - a collection of artifacts to be downloaded and installed

properties.name: softwareModule
properties.description: A unique indentifier for the software module.

properties.name: artifacts
properties.description: List of software artifacts contained in the module.

properties.name: metadata
properties.description: Any other information which should be passed to the device.

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Moun.description: Represents filesystem artifacts mounted from the host to the container

properties.name: source
properties.description: Path to the source mount point

properties.name: destination
properties.description: Path to the container mount point

properties.name: propagationMode
properties.description: Propagation mode of the mount point

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name for the software module.

properties.name: version
properties.description: Version of the software module.

org.eclipse.vorto:Unit:1.0.1.description: SI units plus some common imperial units

properties.name: url
properties.description: Url to download the artifact.

properties.name: md5url
properties.description: Url to download the MD5SUM file.

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.containers:Rest.description: Represents the container's restart policy configuratoin

properties.name: maxRetryCount
properties.description: Max number of restart attempts

properties.name: retryTimeout
properties.description: Retry timeout in seconds

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the container's restart policy

org.eclipse.hawkbit:DependencyDescriptio.description: Describes an installed software or other dependencies for a device.

properties.name: group
properties.description: Group name (e.g. vendor). This should be unique together with name.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the software or hardware part.

properties.name: version
properties.description: Version or value uniquely identifying the software or hardware.

properties.name: type
properties.description: An additional classification type, e.g. hw-part, docker, etc.

operations.name: create
operations.description: Creates a new container instance using the provided image ref applying the default config for a container

operations.name: createWithConfig
operations.description: Creates a new container instance and a feature must be registered based on the provided config

org.eclipse.hawkbit:SoftwareRemoveAction.description: Action instructing the device to remove a defined set of software.

properties.name: correlationId
properties.description: An identifier used to correlate the status updates sent from the device for this action.

properties.name: software
properties.description: Software to be removed.

properties.name: weight
properties.description: Priority in case of multiple, parallel instructions.

properties.name: metadata
properties.description: MetaData associated with Eclipse hawkBit's Distribution Set.

properties.name: forced
properties.description: Indicates the urgency of the update, when true the device should install as soon as possible.
